'''Abandoned Caches''' are stockpiles of materials found as you explore glades. They range between Small, Medium, and Large. They require [[File:SimpleTools.png|frameless|18px]] Simple Tools or [[File:InfusedTools.png|frameless|18px]] Infused Tools in order to open, costing more tools the bigger their size is, but each offers better rewards respectively.

Small Caches only appear in regular glades, however Medium and Large Caches can appear both in Dangerous and Forbidden Glades.
